title: N172 Old Judge John Sowders - Kansas City!! - BVG 1 for Sale
author: shammus

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge John Sowders - Kansas City!! - BVG 1 for Sale
posts.post_content:
Very nice looking card for a "1".  There's some corner and mild edge chipping but nothing that really deserves a grading this low.  No creasing or damage done and the back is mostly clean and entirely damage free!

Neat to offer up a card of a Kansas City player as you don't see too many KC Old Judges appear for sale too often.

Asking $210 delivered.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
